content: When the Poison Chief is down, fly up and continue left toward the water. Go almost to the end of the water, where you should see a giant creature. When you get close to it, it will leap in the air and jump to a nearby rock. Fly over to it, then land on its head.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Verdant Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Poison Chief 1'.
The content is as follows:
When the Poison Chief is down, fly up and continue left toward the water. Go almost to the end of the water, where you should see a giant creature. When you get close to it, it will leap in the air and jump to a nearby rock. Fly over to it, then land on its head.
